text: @senatemajldr With all due respect...NO MORE STIMULUS. People need to get back to WORK. The country needs to open up. It's not like people AREN'T going to die if it wasn't for Covid-19 for goodness sake.  Most Americans can certainly be careful. We are capable of doing both. Just ask WalMart.
